FC_VertexBin Struct Reference
[Geometric Relations]

#include <geom.h>

Collaboration diagram for FC_VertexBin:

[legend]

Detailed Description

Spatially binned vertex IDs.

Description:

This is a helper structure to look up vertices by spatial location. Because the bin structure is a regularly structured grid, it is easy to identify which bin a given set of coordinates is in. Then search for a vertexID is reduced to searching only the vertexIDs in this single bin instead of the entire mesh.

Todo:
? someday move mesh bounding box into mesh Modifications:
